body.name: Wooden Tabletop Bookshelf Titled Desktop Bookshelf,Small Bookcases for Magazine Books CDs,Book Rack Desk Book Organizer in Living Room/Office/Bedroom (Burlywood)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 19 hrs 29 mins
features: 【UNIQUE PRACTICAL DESIGN】The desktop bookshelf caters to different home styles with modern and simple elements. The open and tilted shape makes the necessities of the desktop within easy reach, and can quickly solve the clutter of the desk. Beautiful shape, giving people a simple and relaxed visual effect.

【SPACE SAVING】The overall size of the tabletop bookshelf organizer is L15.7''*D10.2''*H9.6'', only occupy 0.1m2, saving floor space, can be placed in any narrow place and easy to move, The length of the storage space is 13'', the height is 8.3'', open style desk bookshelf provides ample space for everyday books, photos and decorations.

【DURABLE & STURDY】The desk book rack is selected from high-quality pine wood, the color of the log, the texture is clear and beautiful, the lines are simple and smooth, the surface is treated, has the characteristics of strong hardness and no deformation, the thickness of the laminate is 0.39'', and V-shape stable structure makes the bookshelf have enough bearing capacity , more stable.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL BOOKSHELF】Simple and stylish desktop book storage shelf, which can store books, magazines, CDs, newspapers, picture books, cookbooks and children's books. The mini bookshelf can not only be placed on the kitchen countertop in the bedroom, office, but also can be used as a student storage rack and children's book display shelf.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】The tilted desk book organizer adopts tenon-and-mortise technology and does not require any installation tools. The product can be easily installed within 5 minutes, and the product can be disassembled at any time. If you have any problems, please contact us in time, we will reply you as soon as possible.

V-Shape Support V-shape is formed between the bracket and the baffle, making the whole bookshelf more stable and safe. Big Space The bottom of the bookcase has enough space for a laptop or small items. Open and Tilted Design The open and inclined design can quickly retrieve the books you need, and you can reach them at your fingertips. Easy to Move Hold the lower end of the support frame with both hands to easily move the entire bookshelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Notch bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: Great bookshelf. Not for large books. Well made easy to assemble. Obviously good grade plywood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Small Bookcase for Desk. Collapsable for storing.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this bookshelf for a kitchen cart I bought my wife to store cookbooks on the shelves, but she could not use it for this purpose because the books sat too high to fit on the it. However, we gave it to my granddaughter and she loves it to store her schoolbooks on her desk. It goes together and comes apart easily, is very sturdy and looks good; all for a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Also very easy to assemble. Very sturdy for larger books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don’t give up yet!
reviews.reviewText: I was so sad when this mini book case didn’t fit in the slots correctly. It looked so unorderly. BUT I grabbed a hammer and I was able to hammer the slots in all the way. I love it! Not the wood I was expecting but it’s smooth and nice! I think I’ll stain it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tiny spaces
reviews.reviewText: I love this little shelf! As someone who lives in an actual tiny house, finding storage for my ever-growing collection of books, Manga, and graphic novels is always a challenge.Until I stumbled on this cute little shelf.The whole thing arrives in four pieces - the bottom and back panel, and the two leg pieces.Assembly was pretty difficult, as the pieces were not sanded beforehand, and I had to use a hammer to put a couple pieces together all the way, but that didn't dent or scratch anything.Overall, assembly was a little tough, but easy, and this little shelf is VERY sturdy. It doesn't wobble or bent at all, and holds plenty of books, obviously depending on how large your titles are.10/10 would recommend for tiny or small spaces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Boards don’t properly align.
reviews.reviewText: I bought three of these. The first one, the boards fit perfectly. Loved it so much, bought a second. The next one I ordered, the boards didn’t align, so ended up throwing it out thinking it was a one time defect, no big deal. Ordered a third, same problem. The boards don’t align to fit in the slots. Will not waste any more money on this product. Don’t recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want a bunch of binders clogging up my desktop space at work. I bought this and assembled it in 2 minutes - just 4 pieces of wood. Would be easy to dis-assemble when moving - just like puzzle pieces. And it does fit the Binders just fine. I put it under my desk so to keep my surface area cleared off and I can easily access my binders from below. Reasonably priced too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Grooves didn’t line up for the bottom piece.
